reviewText: Ethan is extremely talented and has been since a very early age.  We just saw him at around 5 years old playing a ragtime piano piece with extreme proficiency on the Leno show.  We really enjoy his personality and his music ability.  He is like a grownup in a boy's body!
Title: Anything is Possible

reviewText: I thought that it might of been like the movie August Rush which I loved. This compared to August, was a waste of money to me. At least it was a clean movie, which I should give it four stars just for that. A family movie though.
Title: Anything is Possible

reviewText: Ones guardian angel comes in many forms, don't ever forget. Allow life to teach you how to understand true love
Title: Anything is Possible

reviewText: I loved every single minute of this movie.  Everyone should see it to see what the love of a family can make happen.  I wish I could put into words how it made me feel.  I loved what the little girl said, "Anyone can be a Father, but not everyone could be a Dad."  Life can change in an instant.  Always tell the people you love how much you love them because at the end of the day they could not be there, God could want them back.  God worked a miracle in the life of this little boy.  He is amazing.  This movie had some of the most incredible actors in it I have ever seen.  You have to see this movie to believe it.  Thank You God for letting them make such an inspirational movie.  If I could give it more than 5 stars I would.
summary: THE MIRACLES THAT CAN HAPPEN FORM THE LOVE OF A FAMILY!  EVERYONE NEEDS TO SEE THIS MOVIE!
Title: Anything is Possible

reviewText: I had seen Ethan Bortnick perform at a fundraiser & was in awe of this young man's mastery of the piano, his people skills, humility fun manner & kindness. If you enjoy a good human interest story of kindness, community support & using one's talents to help others, then this movie is for you.
Title: Anything is Possible

reviewText: This is a great family movie but one that adults can learn a lot from the children.  While not specifically a Christian film, scriptural principles are the basis of this movie.  Jesus said to His disciples that we needed to become like children in order to enter the kingdom of heaven.  Why?  Children have not yet been tainted by the world and instinctively believe that anything is possible.  This young man is remarkable and his willingness to move beyond his fears to help others, even while he is in the midst of his own pain and situation, will bring you to tears!  There is specifically one scene in the movie where the innocence of a child is so clearly demonstrated when the young man is hiding in the basement and asks where he can sleep.  You need to be alert to not miss it, but I  found it to be priceless.  This is a movie that I'll be adding to my movie collection.
Title: Anything is Possible

reviewText: This was a good movie. No bad words.Good message. Suitable for the wholefamily. I highly recommend this film.
Title: Anything is Possible
